      Subclasses of Offer in com.microsoft.azure.cosmosdb 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OfferV2
      Represents an offer version 2 in the Azure Cosmos DB database service.
      Constructors in com.microsoft.azure.cosmosdb with parameters of type Offer 
      Constructor and Description
      Offer(Offer otherOffer)
      Initialize an offer object and copy all properties from the other offer.
      OfferV2(Offer otherOffer)
      Initialize an new instance of the OfferV2 object, copy the base properties from another Offer object and set the throughput value.
